author: Harry Craddock
description: Craddock calls for this drink to be shaken, but in this instance, stirring seems more in order. I've also mixed to our preferred 5:1 stirred Dry Martini ratio.
name: Elk Martini
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml La Vieille Prune plum brandy

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
